algorithm_technique: Sort each row, then iterate through columns, summing the maximum element in each column.
problem_summary_simple: Repeatedly remove the largest element from each row and sum these largest elements.
problem_summary_technical: Sort each row, then sum the maximum element across all rows for each column index.
key_insights: To efficiently find the greatest value in each row repeatedly, sorting each row first is optimal.
After sorting, the greatest value in a row will always be at the last column.
The problem then reduces to finding the maximum value across all rows for each column index (after sorting).
